name: Voltar
description: Voltar is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is a dedicated member of the WebtrES club. With its cat-like box body, soldier buttons, foundry arms and legs, and a red and black screen, Voltar stands out among its robotic peers. To enhance its visual capabilities, Voltar is equipped with a pair of sleek glasses. Its unique design and advanced features make Voltar an invaluable asset to the club.
